ing: 1 (8 ounce) container lowfat coconut flavored yogurt
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This is a light and delicious coconut pie that requires no baking.  You can use pina colada or plain coconut flavored yogurt in this recipe."
ins: Beat together cream cheese and sugar. Mix in yogurt and coconut. Gently fold in topping. Spoon into crust, cover, and chill in refrigerator for at least 3 hours.
